# contactDelegate

**Instance Property**

A delegate that is called when two physics bodies come in contact with each other.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var contactDelegate: (any SKPhysicsContactDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A contact is created when two physics bodies overlap and one of the physics bodies has a [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsBody/contactTestBitMask] property that overlaps with the other body’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsBody/categoryBitMask] property. By default, a physics body’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKPhysicsBody/contactTestBitMask] is set to all bits cleared.
title: contactDelegate
